title.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Feb. 18, 1926Swedish Newspaper Man Enters Commercial Field

div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Feb. 18, 1926SWEDISH NEWSPAPER MAN ENTERS COMMERCIAL FIELD

body.p: Sven H.S. Leonard, singer, radio announcer and ex-journalist, has now made connections as sales manager with the Nelson Bond & Mortgage Co., 6310-12 Broadway. His journalistic experience and the fact that he now is a full-fledged lawyer, will prove valuable assests for him in his new work.
For about fifteen years, Mr. Leonard held the position as co-editor of the Swedish Tribune News.
